llama2:70b_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 13th): Peoria to Moline

* Take a flight from Peoria to Moline on F3594780, departing at 10:46 and arriving at 11:36.
* Check-in at a hotel in Moline that allows children under 10 and has a budget of $300 per night.

Day 2 (March 14th): Moline

* Spend the day exploring Moline, visiting attractions such as the John Deere Pavilion and the Quad City Botanical Center.
* For dinner, head to the downtown area and enjoy one of the many family-friendly restaurants.

Day 3 (March 15th): Moline to Chicago

* Take a flight from Moline to Chicago on F3837984, departing at 06:25 and arriving at 07:05.
* Check-in at a hotel in Chicago that allows children under 10 and has a budget of $300 per night.

Day 4 (March 16th): Chicago

* Spend the day exploring Chicago, visiting attractions such as Navy Pier, Millennium Park, and the Art Institute of Chicago.
* For dinner, head to one of the many family-friendly restaurants in the city.

Day 5 (March 17th): Chicago to Rockford

* Take a taxi from Chicago to Rockford, departing at 09:00 and arriving at 11:30.
* Check-in at a hotel in Rockford that allows children under 10 and has a budget of $200 per night.

Day 6 (March 18th): Rockford

* Spend the day exploring Rockford, visiting attractions such as the Burpee Museum of Natural History and the Tinker Swiss Cottage Museum and Gardens.
* For dinner, head to one of the many family-friendly restaurants in the city.

Day 7 (March 19th): Rockford to Peoria

* Take a taxi from Rockford to Peoria, departing at 09:00 and arriving at 11:30.
* Check-out of the hotel and head back to Peoria.

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $1,200 (4 x $300)
* Accommodation: $1,800 (6 x $300 per night)
* Transportation: $200 (taxi from Chicago to Rockford and Rockford to Peoria)
* Food and Activities: $2,200 (approximately $314 per day for meals and activities)
* Total: $8,400

This itinerary should fit your budget of $8,400 and accommodate your group's preference for accommodations that allow children under 10. It also includes a mix of attractions and activities that are suitable for families with young children.
